wikipedia_page.main: RemedySounds (born 19 July 1989 in Portsmouth, England) is an English dubstep/acoustic musician who makes special use loop pedals to create his sound. In July 2012, he was announced as the runner up of the Acoustic category of Live and Unsigned at the age of 22. In June 2012, he performed alongside Macy Gray at Guernsey Festival in Guernsey.
